metadata.title: CVE-2018-21016 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
audio_sample_entry_AddBox() at isomedia/box_code_base.c in GPAC 0.7.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-21016` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
gpac-modules-base - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
libgpac10 - 1.0.1+dfsg1-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ccextractor package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
gpac package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.1+dfsg1-3').
